Question: This person passed for 386 yards in the game.
Hints: In a 35–3 victory against the Cincinnati Bengals, this person threw 3 TD passes while completing 26 of 32 passes for 277 yards.
During the season, this person threw for 4,557 yards, had a then record 121.1 passer rating and a then-record 49 touchdown passes.
This person took over and moved the Colts to the Saints' 31 yard line.
